lame.std

Interface MPEG_mode


  • public interface MPEG_mode
    MPEG modes: 
        typedef enum MPEG_mode_e {
      STEREO = 0,
      JOINT_STEREO,
      DUAL_CHANNEL,    // LAME doesn't supports this! 
      MONO,
      NOT_SET,
      MAX_INDICATOR    // Don't use this! It's used for sanity checks. 
    } MPEG_mode;
